name: api_utility_AccessibilityHierarchy
description: The hierarchy data model that the screen reader uses to navigate and interact with a Unity application.

properties.name: rootNodes
properties.description: The root nodes of the hierarchy.

properties.name: AddNode
properties.description: Creates a new AccessibilityNode with the given label and adds it to the hierarchy under the given pa

properties.name: Clear
properties.description: Resets the hierarchy to an empty state, removing all nodes and the screen reader focus.

properties.name: ContainsNode
properties.description: Verifies whether the given node exists in the accessibility hierarchy.

properties.name: GetLowestCommonAncestor
properties.description: Retrieves the lowest common ancestor of two nodes in the accessibility hierarchy.

properties.name: InsertNode
properties.description: Creates a new AccessibilityNode with the given label and inserts it at the given index in the hierar

properties.name: MoveNode
properties.description: Moves the node elsewhere in the accessibility hierarchy. For example, under a different parent or at

properties.name: RefreshNodeFrames
properties.description: Refreshes the AccessibilityNode.frame of all nodes in the accessibility hierarchy.

properties.name: RemoveNode
properties.description: Removes the node from the accessibility hierarchy and removes or re-parents its descendants.

properties.name: TryGetNode
properties.description: Tries to retrieve the AccessibilityNode with the given ID in the hierarchy.

properties.name: TryGetNodeAt
properties.description: Tries to retrieve the AccessibilityNode at the given screen coordinates.
